doc.title: Especial
doc.plot: SPECIAL story: A boy Sasha by name who lives in the provincial Russian town Koshkin has a dream of being special ... All of a sudden unusual events take place in the town: in school new lessons are taught, Sasha's friends and other people start behave very strangely ... Sashka is aware that chief Bad Guy in the town Uncle Tolik made a decision to make zombies out of town residents and bend them to his will with a secret device. It turns out that it is Sashka, an ordinary schoolboy, is beyond his influence and cannot be made to behave in the "right" way. He is SPECIAL and it put the chief Bad Guy on his guard. Day after day the situation in the town is becoming charged with more and more tension ... Willing to look into what is happening Sashka starts his own investigation and opens the secret of the device which his dead farther designed for peaceful purposes, and which became a tool of evil in the hands of the Bad Guy. The last instructions of his farther come to his mind, and Sashka understands that the crystal his farther once gave him as a present is magic and what it is made for. Thanks to courage, his kind heart and magic power of the crystal Sashka directs the evil to itself and the good wins!
